main.name: Paul Wilson
main.bio: I am a systems engineer who has worked in both private and public cloud.  I have a passion for building websites and applications, I enjoy in working in both the front end and back end.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: These are the technical skills I am good at.  I am proficient in some while others I'm still learning.  I'd love to learn more.

projects.title: Covid19 NSW
projects.description: I made this when the recent pandemic started. It is a Python Flask site running in an EC2 instance. Some pages include React for interactivity.

projects.title: Couch Buddy
projects.description: This is a NextJS React site hosted in Vercel. There is also a backend Python component that refreshes the data daily, with data in AWS S3 and Cloudfront.

projects.title: The General Quiz
projects.description: This is hosted in AWS Amplify, utilising AppSync with GraphQL and DynamoDB. The website is created with React Native with the plan to make it into a mobile App. I also have an admin website for this that uses React with Cognito for authentication.

projects.title: SnackBar Parking
projects.description: I made this with Django and it is hosted at Heroku. It had a short creative life but it was helpful in learning Django.
